findings.title: Adding safety checks for ERC20 voting token in TokenAdapter initialize
findings.description: Not all ERC20 tokens can be used as voting tokens for the Governor contract.

findings.title: submissionPeriodPct value is not used in the Governor contract
findings.description: The submissionPeriodPct can be set with the setPeriodPct together with delayPeriodPct and castingPeriodPct but is not used afterward.
